title: 'Less wide than it appears'
body: Decent product, made from hard foam with fabric layer on top. It can easily be converted to makeshift bed. Quite hard for my liking but may hold shape over time since it's hard. You can add thin cushions to base to make it comfortable. One medium size cushion provided with single size sofa for back support.

title: 'Stitching is poor'

title: 'Value for Money
column5: The media could not be loaded. Pros: its lightweight, can be easily carried. As it says, it's convertible to use as sofa and as bed. I bought the size for 2 person, and it can easily accommodate 2. Like the color, sharp and crispy 2 small pillows along with it. Doesn't recomend to use while sleeping as once its not comfortable and easily gets shrink down. Not sure what material used in pillow.  Cons: initially felt hard, but was okay. after 1 week of continuous usage can see small shape issues occuring. not much but slightly as of now and the cushioning geting more comfortable. would recommend not to spill anything on it as it easily gets absorbed. They mentioned the cover is washable but not tried yet.  Note: Review is based on experience of using this for 1 week only.
